uvi.description:
media: firewire: firedtv-avc: fix a buffer overflow in avc_ca_pmt()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.78 by commit d7fc85f6104259541ec136199d3bf7c8a736613d. For more details please see the references link.
